segments.text: I see the kitchen scene quite clearly from here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's an adult woman near the sink, completely absorbed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's drying a plate with a dish towel, her gaze fixed intently on it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sink, oh my goodness, it's overflowing massively!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is gushing over the front edge in a continuous sheet onto the cabinet doors and floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already submerged in the puddle of water, yet she shows no reaction at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression remains perfectly neutral, as if nothing is amiss.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she possibly be so unaware of the growing flood around her?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The entire lower cabinet is getting soaked.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a genuine shame to see such a mess developing so needlessly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is just running and running, the drain doing nothing to stop it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This water damage is going to be significant.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s like watching a slow-motion disaster unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find her complete obliviousness truly astonishing.
segments.speaker: PAR
